com.alexvasilkov.android.commons.adapters

类 ItemsAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.alexvasilkov.android.commons.adapters.ItemsAdapter<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    直接已知子类:
    LayoutItemsAdapter

    public abstract class ItemsAdapter<T>
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Simple BaseAdapter implementation to use with any List.
    getView method is divided into createView and bindView methods.

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

    • 构造器概要

      构造器

      int getCount()

    • 方法详细资料

      • setItemsList

        public void setItemsList(java.util.List<T> list)
        Sets list to this adapter and calls BaseAdapter.notifyDataSetChanged() to update underlying ListView.
        You can pass null to clear the adapter

      • getItemsList

        public java.util.List<T> getItemsList()

      • getContext

      • getLayoutInflater

      • getItem

        public T getItem(int position)

      • getItem

        public T getItem(long id)
        Default implementation of this adapter uses pos as id. So we can find item by it's id with no problems.

      • getItemId

        public long getItemId(int pos)
